Text: Re Lost Creek Docsone thing that Chris asked for was an expansion of the area in which Lost Creek would agree not to compete for gathering They asked to include Long Butte in the area in addition to Madden Both Mark and I have rejected this idea as I have already had discussions with the operator of Long Butte about gathering their gas on Lost Creek That really wasnt the deal to begin with anyway Also have you drafted the ENA IT gathering agreement with Lost Creek We really need to execute that thing in the next two weeks I just got off the phone with Chris at BR He has reviewed the agreements with Lee and Lee had a couple of points One is if the Administrative Manager goes to a cashout method of balancing the system for some reason and Lost Creek owes under the balancing provision where do the funds come from I know that it would come from the sale of the excess gas that has been delivered to Lost Creek but I guess it is now clear how the gas is sold and how those funds are handled The same would apply to funds received from a shipper who is under balanced Again Lost Creek would use the funds to purchase gas to restore line pack but what about the excess funds How does Lost Creek purchase the gas Actually good questions Also Lee had some clean up language he wanted to propose on the fuel disposition issue Would you call Chris to get that and discuss it directly with him If you want me on the call just let me know ThanksJames
Cobb ContactInfo William M Cobb Associates Inc Coit Road Suite Dallas TX phone fax Contact Randal M Brush Senior Vice President If you need any other info just let me know

Re Lost Creek IT Agreementread the agreement and my only comment sounds like something Chris Hoekenga might say so treat it with the same amount of respect Along the same rationale for defining Standard Pressure we could define Standard Temperature as o F If it makes the agreement shorter or easier to read then its a thought I really need to get away from BR for a while
Schedule II Changesare the correct parameters to be inserted in Schedule II L miles d inches Ke All other parameters are correct

Lost Creek Issuesis the document that Chris is using if you dont already have it Forwarded by James HoffDENECT on Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Chris Hoekenga Please respond to To cc Lee Hanse Subject Lost Creek Issues Attached is the list of issues we talked about at the last members meeting After reviewing the LLC and Capacity Allocation agreement I believe we are OK on numbers and Give me a call at your convenience and we can talk about the rest LOSTCREEKISSUESDOC
Lost Creek Members Meeting Draft Agendais the draft agenda for the Lost Creek Members Meeting Please let me know of additions or deletions ThanksJames
Re Lost Creek Docscontracts look fine to me I checked with Mark and you can send them on the Chris and the others at BR Thanks for all your hard workJames
